code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> Opened: Issue created
    
    Opened --> Triage: Auto-added to project
    
    Triage --> Todo: Accepted & prioritized
    Triage --> Closed: Rejected / Duplicate
    Triage --> NeedsInfo: More information needed
    
    NeedsInfo --> Triage: Information provided
    NeedsInfo --> Closed: No response
    
    Todo --> InProgress: Work started
    
    InProgress --> InReview: PR opened
    InProgress --> Blocked: Dependencies / Issues
    InProgress --> Todo: Paused / Deprioritized
    
    Blocked --> InProgress: Unblocked
    Blocked --> Todo: Alternative approach
    
    InReview --> InProgress: Changes requested
    InReview --> Done: PR merged
    
    Done --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]: Issue closed
    Closed --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    
    note right of Opened
        Labels applied:
        - Type (FinTech_LedgerService)
        - Area (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    end note
    
    note right of Triage
        Platform/Owner reviews:
        - Is it valid?
        - What's the priority?
        - Who should work on it?
    end note
    
    note right of Todo
        Work is planned:
        - Priority: P0-P3
        - Effort: XS-XL
        - Owner Team assigned
    end note
    
    note right of InProgress
        Active development:
        - Branch created
        - Commits happening
        - Regular updates
    end note
    
    note right of InReview
        PR review:
        - CODEOWNERS review
        - CI checks passing
        - Approvals required
    end note
    
    note right of Done
        Completed:
        - PR merged
        - Changes deployed
        - Issue auto-closed
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
